import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import userData from "../App" import "../styles/nav.scss" export default function Navbar(){ const months = [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December', ]; const [month, setMonth] = useState(null) const user = useContext(userData) window.addEventListener( 'scroll', function (e) { console.log(e.height); }, false ); return(
MyCalendarApp
  • Home (current)
  • Friends
  • Create
    {months.map((month, index)=>( setMonth(index)} class="dropdown-item">{months[index]} ))}
    • {/*
  • Chat

) }
